product_name: The North Face Steeps Shell Jacket - Men's
long_description: With lumberjack-inspired style and windproof, waterproof protection, the Steeps shell jacket from The North Face ensures you'll stay dry as you keep your stoke and style as fresh as the pow. HyVent(TM) 2-layer construction is waterproof, windproof and breathable; fully sealed seams prevent moisture from seeping through. Stretch powder skirt with gripping elastic keeps snow out; snaps let you integrate the powder skirt with compatible pants by The North Face (sold separately). Adjustable hood offers a customized fit with unobstructed vision; hood can be secured to jacket when not in use, keeping it from flapping in the wind and cramping your style. Zippered underarm vents let you control airflow to keep you comfortable. Adjustable hem and rip-and-stick cuffs with thumbholes dial in the fit and retain valuable warmth. Zip hand pockets; flap chest pockets; external access to media pocket; zippered wrist pocket with goggles cloth; internal goggles pocket. The North Face Steeps shell jacket has a relaxed fit with a roomy body and sleeves.
short_description: With lumberjack-inspired style and windproof, waterproof protection, the Steeps shell jacket from The North Face ensures you'll stay dry as you keep your stoke and style as fresh as the pow.
